The statement made by Tom King: the president of the New York State Rifle and Pistol Association, regarding a bill in Congress that would ban all semi-automatic weapons.
The mention of House Resolution 5057 as: which was found to have no relation to guns.
The clarification that House Resolution: titled the Assault Weapons Ban of 2018, is the relevant bill proposed by Rep. David Cicilline.
The details of Rep: Cicilline's bill, which includes a ban on the sale of new semi-automatic firearms with certain military-style features.
